set_bracket_role.help: Role to add when a player registers and is in this bracket

set_players_spreadsheet.help: Sets the players spreadsheet to allow registration

set_schedules_spreadsheet.help: Sets the schedules spreadsheet to allow reschedule

set_schedules_spreadsheet_sheet_name.help: Sets the sheet name of the schedules spreadsheet

set_schedules_spreadsheet_date_format.help: Sets the date format used in the date range of the schedules spreadsheet
set_schedules_spreadsheet_date_format.usage:
Usage: `%set_schedules_spreadsheet_date_format $./parameter`

Example: `%set_schedules_spreadsheet_date_format %d %B`
This flag example corresponds to a string like `01 April`.

For more information about the possible flags, check https://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#strftime-and-strptime-format-codes.

set_schedules_spreadsheet_staff_is_range.help: Sets the staff_is_range of the schedules spreadsheet
